TestCase.name: testAggRemove_Count
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(c) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_CountStar
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(*) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_Cube
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, SUM(b) AS s FROM MyTable3 GROUP BY CUBE(a, c, d)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], s=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], groups=[[{0, 1, 2}, {0, 1}, {0, 2}, {0}, {1, 2}, {1}, {2}, {}]], s=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], d=[$3], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, s]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2, 4}], s=[SUM($3)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a, c, d, b, 0 AS $e}, {a, c, null AS d, b, 1 AS $e}, {a, null AS c, d, b, 2 AS $e}, {a, null AS c, null AS d, b, 3 AS $e}, {null AS a, c, d, b, 4 AS $e}, {null AS a, c, null AS d, b, 5 AS $e}, {null AS a, null AS c, d, b, 6 AS $e}, {null AS a, null AS c, null AS d, b, 7 AS $e}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c, d, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_GroupKeyIsNotUnique
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, MAX(c) from MyTable1 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MAX($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MAX($1)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_GroupSets1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, SUM(b) AS s FROM MyTable3 GROUP BY GROUPING SETS((a, c), (a, d))

LogicalProject(a=[$0], s=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0, 2}]], s=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], d=[$3], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b AS s]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a, c, null AS d, b, 1 AS $e}, {a, null AS c, d, b, 2 AS $e}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c, d, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_GroupSets2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, SUM(b) AS s FROM MyTable3 GROUP BY GROUPING SETS((a, c), (a), ())

LogicalProject(a=[$0], s=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], groups=[[{0, 1}, {0}, {}]], s=[SUM($2)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, s]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 3}], s=[SUM($2)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a, c, b, 0 AS $e}, {a, null AS c, b, 1 AS $e}, {null AS a, null AS c, b, 3 AS $e}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_MultiDistinctAggs1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(DISTINCT b), SUM(DISTINCT b) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$2=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1)], EXPR$2=[SUM($1)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_MultiDistinctAggs2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(DISTINCT c), SUM(DISTINCT b) FROM MyTable3 GROUP BY a, d

LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[$2], EXPR$2=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$1=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)], EXPR$2=[SUM(DISTINCT $3)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3], c=[$2], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, EXPR$1, EXPR$2]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], d=[AUXILIARY_GROUP($1)], EXPR$1=[COUNT($2) FILTER $4], EXPR$2=[SUM($3) FILTER $5]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, d, c, b, =(CASE(=($e, 1:BIGINT), 1:BIGINT, 2:BIGINT), 1) AS $g_1, =(CASE(=($e, 1:BIGINT), 1:BIGINT, 2:BIGINT), 2) AS $g_2]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a, d, c, null AS b, 1 AS $e}, {a, d, null AS c, b, 2 AS $e}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, d, c, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_MultiDistinctAggs3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, SUM(DISTINCT b), MAX(DISTINCT b), MIN(DISTINCT c) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[SUM(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$2=[MAX($1)], EXPR$3=[MIN($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b AS EXPR$1, b AS EXPR$2, c AS EXPR$3]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_MultiDistinctAggs_WithNonDistinctAgg1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(DISTINCT c), SUM(b) FROM MyTable3 GROUP BY a, d

LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[$2], EXPR$2=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$1=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)], EXPR$2=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3], c=[$2], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, EXPR$1, EXPR$2]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], d=[AUXILIARY_GROUP($1)], EXPR$1=[COUNT($2) FILTER $4], EXPR$2=[MIN($3) FILTER $5]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, d, c, b AS EXPR$2, =(CASE(=($e, 0:BIGINT), 0:BIGINT, 1:BIGINT), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e, 0:BIGINT), 0:BIGINT, 1:BIGINT), 1) AS $g_1]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a, d, c, b, 0 AS $e}, {a, d, null AS c, b, 1 AS $e}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, d, c, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_Rollup
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, SUM(b) AS s FROM MyTable3 GROUP BY ROLLUP(a, c, d)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], s=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2}], groups=[[{0, 1, 2}, {0, 1}, {0}, {}]], s=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], d=[$3], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, s]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2, 4}], s=[SUM($3)]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a, c, d, b, 0 AS $e}, {a, c, null AS d, b, 1 AS $e}, {a, null AS c, null AS d, b, 3 AS $e}, {null AS a, null AS c, null AS d, b, 7 AS $e}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c, d, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_SingleDistinctAgg1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(DISTINCT c) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT(DISTINCT $1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_SingleDistinctAgg2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(DISTINCT c) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a, b

LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$1=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, EXPR$1]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b=[AUXILIARY_GROUP($1)], EXPR$1=[COUNT($2)]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_SingleDistinctAgg_WithNonDistinctAgg1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(DISTINCT b), SUM(b) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$2=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1) FILTER $3], EXPR$2=[MIN($2) FILTER $4]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, b_0 AS EXPR$2, =(CASE(=($e, 0:BIGINT), 0:BIGINT, 1:BIGINT), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e, 0:BIGINT), 0:BIGINT, 1:BIGINT), 1) AS $g_1]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a, b, 0 AS $e, b AS b_0}, {a, null AS b, 1 AS $e, b AS b_0}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_SingleDistinctAgg_WithNonDistinctAgg2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(DISTINCT b), SUM(b) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a, c

LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[$2], EXPR$2=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$1=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)], EXPR$2=[SUM($2)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, EXPR$1, EXPR$2]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], c=[AUXILIARY_GROUP($1)], EXPR$1=[COUNT($2) FILTER $4], EXPR$2=[MIN($3) FILTER $5]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c, b, b_0 AS EXPR$2, =(CASE(=($e, 0:BIGINT), 0:BIGINT, 1:BIGINT), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e, 0:BIGINT), 0:BIGINT, 1:BIGINT), 1) AS $g_1]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a, c, b, 0 AS $e, b AS b_0}, {a, c, null AS b, 1 AS $e, b AS b_0}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_SingleDistinctAgg_WithNonDistinctAgg3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(DISTINCT c), SUM(b) FROM MyTable3 GROUP BY a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT(DISTINCT $1)], EXPR$2=[SUM($2)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT($1) FILTER $3], EXPR$2=[MIN($2) FILTER $4]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c, b AS EXPR$2, =(CASE(=($e, 0:BIGINT), 0:BIGINT, 1:BIGINT), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e, 0:BIGINT), 0:BIGINT, 1:BIGINT), 1) AS $g_1]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a, c, b, 0 AS $e}, {a, null AS c, b, 1 AS $e}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_SingleDistinctAgg_WithNonDistinctAgg4
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, COUNT(DISTINCT c), SUM(b) FROM MyTable3 GROUP BY a, d

LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[$2], EXPR$2=[$3]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], EXPR$1=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)], EXPR$2=[SUM($3)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3], c=[$2], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, EXPR$1, EXPR$2]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], d=[AUXILIARY_GROUP($1)], EXPR$1=[COUNT($2) FILTER $4], EXPR$2=[MIN($3) FILTER $5]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, d, c, b AS EXPR$2, =(CASE(=($e, 0:BIGINT), 0:BIGINT, 1:BIGINT), 0) AS $g_0, =(CASE(=($e, 0:BIGINT), 0:BIGINT, 1:BIGINT), 1) AS $g_1]) +- FlinkLogicalExpand(projects=[{a, d, c, b, 0 AS $e}, {a, d, null AS c, b, 1 AS $e}]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, d, c, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable3, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithFilter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, MIN(c) FILTER (WHERE b > 0), MAX(b) FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a

LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MIN($1) FILTER $2], EXPR$2=[MAX($3)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], $f2=[IS TRUE(>($1, 0))], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[MIN($1) FILTER $2], EXPR$2=[MAX($3)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c, IS TRUE(>(b, 0)) AS $f2, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutAggCall
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a, b
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutFilter1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b + 1, c, s FROM (SELECT a, MIN(b) AS b, SUM(b) AS s, MAX(c) AS c FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[+($1, 1)], c=[$3], s=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], b=[MIN($1)], s=[SUM($1)], c=[MAX($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, +(b, 1) AS EXPR$1, c, b AS s]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutFilter2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, SUM(b) AS s FROM MyTable2 GROUP BY a
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], s=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutGroupBy1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT MAX(a), SUM(b), MIN(c) FROM MyTable2
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MAX($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)], EXPR$2=[MIN($2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MAX($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)], EXPR$2=[MIN($2)]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutGroupBy2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT MAX(a), SUM(b), MIN(c) FROM (VALUES (1, 2, 3)) T(a, b, c)
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MAX($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)], EXPR$2=[MIN($2)]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 1, 2, 3 }]])
FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[MAX($0)], EXPR$1=[SUM($1)], EXPR$2=[MIN($2)]) +- FlinkLogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 1, 2, 3 }]])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutGroupBy3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT SUM(a) FROM MyTable1 WHERE 1=2)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[EXISTS({ LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) LogicalProject(a=[$0]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 2)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) })]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b, c]) +- FlinkLogicalJoin(condition=[$3], joinType=[semi]) :- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[IS NOT NULL(m) AS $f0]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], m=[MIN($0)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[true AS i]) +- FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a]) +- FlinkLogicalValues(tuples=[[]])

TestCase.name: testAggRemove_WithoutGroupBy4
TestCase.Resource: SELECT SUM(a) FROM (SELECT a FROM MyTable2 WHERE 1=2)

LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
FlinkLogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a]) +- FlinkLogicalValues(tuples=[[]])
